name: Commonwealth v. Hilliard et al., Appellants

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: Commonwealth v. Hilliard et al., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Orders affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Lee G. McCandless, with him Charles T. Chew, for appellants.

Robert J. Stock, Special Counsel, with him Benjamin B. Solomon, Assistant Attorney General, Raymond C. Miller, Deputy Attorney General, and William O. Sennett, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hilliard et al., Appellants.
Argued October 10, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused February 17, 1969.
Lee G. McCandless, with him Charles T. Chew, for appellants.
Robert J. Stock, Special Counsel, with him Benjamin B. Solomon, Assistant Attorney General, Raymond C. Miller, Deputy Attorney General, and William O. Sennett, Attorney General, for Commonwealth, appellee.
January 15, 1969:
